name: Normal Fishing Simulator
description:
Edit: There is a bug where the shop automatically buys the item in the lower slot. I only had 48 hrs so i couldn't fix it.

A normal fishing simulator.

Except for the mermaids.

And the sharks.

And the ghosts. The rotten pears. The bombs. The arcade machine.

Yeah, pretty normal.

Arrow Keys or WASD for movement

Spacebar to reel in once you are satisfied with your catch

Unity project is provided above if you want to see my horrendous code.
